tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE wildlife_tracking (
  animal_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  species VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  location POINT NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE WildlifePopulations (
    ID INT PRIMARY KEY,
    Species VARCHAR(50),
    Latitude DECIMAL(10,8),
    Longitude DECIMAL(11,8),
    Timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE MovementPatterns (
    ID INT PRIMARY KEY,
    PopulationID INT,
    MovementType VARCHAR(50),
    Speed DECIMAL(5,2),
    Direction VARCHAR(20),
    CONSTRAINT FK_PopulationID FOREIGN KEY (PopulationID) REFERENCES WildlifePopulations(ID)
);

CREATE TABLE GPS_Tracking_Data (
	timestamp TIMESTAMP,
	latitude FLOAT,
	longitude FLOAT,
	animal_id INT,
	PRIMARY KEY(timestamp, animal_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Movement_Patterns (
	id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	animal_id INT,
	movement_type VARCHAR,
	start_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
	end_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE GPS_Tracking_Data (
   tracking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   animal_id INT,
   latitude FLOAT,
   longitude FLOAT,
   timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE tracking_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT NOT NULL,
    latitude DECIMAL(10, 8) NOT NULL,
    longitude DECIMAL(11, 8) NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE movement_patterns (
    pattern_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    species_id INT NOT NULL,
    start_location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    end_location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    total_distance DECIMAL(12, 3) NOT NULL,
    average_speed DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);
